maqras.text: 37|145|Arasesata te'omka ami niksepa karailo eta trnahina tha'ita, arau te'om achila asustha.
37|146|Arau ami tara oparata iyakatina prajatira eta gacha gaja'i tulilo
37|147|arau te'omka ami eka lakha ba tatokai bechi lokara ocarata praerana karailo.
37|148|Eteke te'omloke imana anichila, phalata ami te'omlokaka kichu kalara babe jiranopabhoga karaibalai dilo.
37|149|Eteke sihamtaka sodhacona, ‘(e'ito kenekuraa katha) tomara pratipalakara babe kan'ya santana arau sihamtara babe putra santana’
37|150|athaba ami phiraistasakalaka narairaupe srsti karaichilo neki ye, seya sihamte dekhichila
37|151|jani thoraa, niscaya sihamte manesaja katha kaya ye
37|152|‘allahe santana janma diche’. Niscaya sihamta michaliya.
37|153|Te'om putra santanara paraibarte kan'ya santana pachanda karaiche neki
37|154|ki haiche tomalokara? Tomaloke kenekuraa bicara karaa
37|155|tente tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraibane
37|156|ne tomalokara kono suspasta dalila-pramana ache
37|157|yadi tomaloke satyabadi tente tomalokara kitaba lai aha.
37|158|Sihamte allaha arau jina jatira majata atmiyatara samparka sthira karaiche, athaca jinabilake jane ye, niscaya sihamtaka upasthita karaa ha’ba (sastira babe).
37|159|Sihamte yi araopa karae tara paraa allaha paraitra arau mahana
37|160|kerala allahara ekanistha bandasakalara bahirae.
37|161|Niscaya tomaloke arau tomaloke yiborara ibadata karaa se'iborae
37|162|(ekanistha bandasakalara) kako tomaloke allaha samparke bibhraanta karaiba noraaraiba
37|163|kerala prajjbalita ju'ita yijana dagdha ha’ba tara bahirae.
37|164|Arau (jibraile ka’le) ‘amara pratyekarae babe ache nirdharaita sthana
37|165|‘arau niscaya ami saraibad'dhabharae dandayamana
37|166|‘arau niscaya ami te'omra paraitrata arau mahima ghosanakarai’.
37|167|Arau sihamte (makkabasibilake) arasye kaichila
37|168|‘purbarartisakalara darae yadi amarao ekhana upadesamulaka kitaba thakilehemtena
37|169|‘tente arasye ami allahara ekanistha banda ha’lohemtena’.
37|170|Kintu sihamte seya (kora'anaka) asbikara karaile, eteke anatipalame sihamte janibalai paba.
37|171|Niscaya amara praeraita bandasakalara bisaye amara e'i katha purbe'i nirdharaita haiche ye
37|172|niscaya te'omloka sahayyapraapta ha’ba.
37|173|Arau niscaya amara sain'yabahiniye'i bijayi ha’ba.
37|174|Eteke kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka.
37|175|Arau tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama).
37|176|Sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
37|177|eteke yetiya sihamtara cotalata sasti nami ahiba tetiya satarkakrta bilakara prabhata kimana ye nikrsta ha’ba
37|178|arau kichu samayara babe tumi sihamtara paraa mukha ghuraa'i thaka.
37|179|Tumi sihamtaka paryabeksana karaa, atisighrae sihamte dekhibalai paba (iyara parainama).
37|180|Sihamte yi araopa karae, tara paraa tomara raba paraitra arau mahana, sakalo ksamatara adhikarai.
37|181|Arau santi barsita ha'omka raachulasakalara prati.
37|182|Arau sakalo dharanara prasansa kerala srstijagatara raba allaharae'i praapya.
38|1|Coraada, sapata upadesapurna kora'anara
38|2|baram kaphirasakala aud'dhatya arau biraodhitata nipatita hai ache.
38|3|Ihamtara purbe ami bahuto janagosthika dhbansa karaicho, tetiya sihamte (sahaya bicarai) cinamraichila. Kintu tetiya paraitraanara kono samaya nachila.
38|4|Arau sihamte bismaya bodha karaiche ye, sihamtara ocarata sihamtara majara paraa'i ejana satarkakarai ahiche arau kaphirasakale kaya, ‘e'om ejana yadukara, michaliya’.
38|5|‘E'om sakalo ilahaka kerala ejana ilaha bana'i laiche neki? Niscaya e'ito eta atyascarya bisaya!’
38|6|Arau sihamtara netrsthaniya byaktisakale e'i katha kai amtarai yaya ye, ‘tomaloke'o guci yoraa arau nija nija upasyabilakara pujata abicala thaka. Niscaya e'i bisayato uddesyamulaka’.
38|7|Ami ana kono dharmadarsata enekuraa katha ketiya'o suna na'i, e'ito manesaja uktira bahirae ana eko nahaya.

38|8|‘Amara majara paraa kerala te'omra oparatahe yikara (kora'ana) aratirna karaa ha’la’? Prakrtate sihamte amara kora'ana samparke sandehata patita haiche. Baram sihamte etiya'o mora sasti bhoga karaa na'i.
38|9|Athaba sihamtara ocarata tomara pratipalakara bhandara ache neki? Yijana mahaparaakramasali, asima data.

38|10|Athaba akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora majara sakalo bastura oparata sihamtara kono kartrtba ache neki? Yadi ache teneha’le sihamte kono upaya aralambana karai (akasalai) araohana karaa ucita
38|11|e'i bahini tata arasye paraajita ha’ba, purbararti dalasamuhara darae.
38|12|Ihamtara purbe'o asbikara karaichila nuhara sampradaye, ada arau lauha saladharai phira'a'une
38|13|arau chamuda, lagate luta sampradaya arau a'ikara adhibasibilake'o. Sihamta achila eko ekota bisala bahini.
38|14|Sihamtara pratyeke'i raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila. Phalata sihamtara oparata amara sasti sabyasta haichila.
38|15|Arau ihamta kerala apeksa karai ache eta bikata sabdara, yara pichata kono biraama nathakiba.
38|16|Arau sihamte ka’ba, ‘he amara raba! Hicapa dirasara purbe'i amara praapya amaka sighrae pradana karaa!’
38|17|Sihamte yi kaya se'i bisaye tumi dhairya dharana karaa arau smarana karaa amara saktisali banda da'udara katha, niscaya te'om achila adhika allaha abhimukhi (ta'obakarai).
38|18|Niscaya ami parbatamalaka anugata karai dichilo, yate e'iborae te'omra lagata puraa-gadhuli mora paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae
38|19|Arau samabeta caraa'iborako (anugata karai dichilo); pratyeke'i achila adhika allaha abhimukhi.
38|20|Arau ami te'omra raajyaka sudrrha karaichilo arau te'omka pradana karaichilo hikamata arau mimansakarai bagmita.
